轈字的基本解释

轈
cháo
古代军中用以瞭望敌军的一种兵车。

轈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cháo］
［《廣韻》鉏交切，平肴，崇。］
古代军中窥敌的瞭望车。

轈字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　轈； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1248第15
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?鉏交切，音巢。【說文】兵高車，加巢以望敵也。【左傳·成十六年】楚子登巢車，以望晉軍。《釋文》：《說文》作?。

考證：〔【左傳·成十六年】楚子登巢車，以望晉軍。【註】巢本作?。〕　謹按註無此語，謹改釋文說文作?。
轈字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
轈字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
轈
cháo
A military vehicle used in the ancient army to look at the enemy.
轈
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cháo］
["Guangyun" cross-cutting, flat delicacy, chong. ]
A lookout car in the ancient army to see the enemy.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Che Zi Department] 　轈; Kangxi strokes: 18; Page number: page 1248 15
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Cross cutting, sound nest. [Said the text] Bing high and chariots, add nests to look at the enemy. [Zuo Zhuan·Sixteen years of adulthood] Chu Zi climbed into the nest car to look at the Jin army. "Explanation": "Shuowen" composed?. Textual research: [[Zuo Zhuan·Sixteen years of adulthood] Chu Zi climbed into the nest car to look at the Jin army. [Note] Chao Ben is made?. 〕 　 There is no such word as per the note, and I would like to change the interpretation of Wenshuo Wenzuo?.
